name: Rhythm Diver
description:
Credits

Code: Gregory Weber, https://gregoryweber.itch.io/       
Art: Jony, https://www.artstation.com/jonybir    
Music: limeopolis, https://bytesize.me/limeopolis

How To Play

- When the character is lined up with the red line, hit the corresponding key to the right of the line.

- Two more lines will pop up as your score increases: a line with the key "D" will pop up when the player has reached a score of 10, and a line with the key "V" will pop up when the player has reached a score of 40.

- These key presses are to the beat of the song! So following the beat along will greatly increase your score.

Rhythm Diver

- This game was made for Ludum Dare 48, and was made in 48 hours.
